revision.text: Possibly: The universal English short-hand; or, the way of writing English, in the most easy, concise, regular, and beautiful manner, applicable to any other language, but particularly adjusted to our own. Invented / By John Byrom... (Manchester : Printed by Joseph Harrop, 1767). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1333907~S1
